overview:
Silk Invest is a leading independent ‘on the ground’ specialist fund manager frocused on frontier markets. The company is regulated by the Financial Services Authority in the United Kingdom and has offices in a number of African countries.

The highly experienced executive team includes Zin Bekkali (CEO), Daniel Broby (CIO),Abdeltif Stitou (COO), Baldwin Berges (Business Development), and Dr Wassem Khan (Private Equity). Dr Heinz Hockman is Chairman of the company.
